data.text: Juda ñɨn awl Pedikos2.1 Juda ñɨn awl Pedikos, ñɨn awl kɨli apnan gep ñɨn ak, tap mɨdup dɨpun ak nɨŋɨd mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgun apal.  owaknɨŋ, kɨli kal mɨgan nokom olap yelak.
2.2 Apo 4.31 Anɨgɨl yelaknɨŋ, gu awl ak wɨsɨp adek alaŋ agɨl, yɨgen awl tek dɨl, gu awl kal mɨgan yelak anɨb ak mɨdupsek kus gak.
2.3 Mat 3.11 Pen won anɨb anep mab mɨŋɨlaŋ tun tek ak apɨl, kɨlop keke amnaknɨŋ,
2.4 Mak 16.17, Apo 1.5, 4.31, 10.44-46, 1 Ko 12.10, 13.1 God Kawnan ne ak kɨlop bak lɨl gek, takaw yɨbɨl keke agɨlak.
Ñɨn anɨb ak, Juda binɨb wakay keke apɨl Jelusalem nan gɨ yelak. Kɨli God nop agnɨŋɨd kɨdek gelɨgɨpal.
Pen gu awl anɨb ak agek nɨŋɨd, binɨb kuŋay apnan gɨlak. Apnan gɨl, kɨli nokom nokom nɨgɨlak, takaw yɨbɨl kɨli ak keke yɨpɨd gɨl nep agelak.
2.7 Apo 1.11 Kɨli nɨŋɨd, gos pal awl lɨl wal agɨl agɨlak, Bɨ okol mɨdupsek Galili nɨb ak pen, tɨtay dɨl takaw yɨbɨl chɨn keke apun tek yɨpɨd gɨl agebal nɨgobun agɨlak?
2.9 2 Ti 1.15 Chɨn ogɨnap Patiya nɨb, ogɨnap Midiya nɨb, ogɨnap Elam nɨb, ogɨnap Mesopodemiya nɨb, ogɨnap Judiya nɨb, ogɨnap Kapadosiya nɨb, ogɨnap Podus nɨb, ogɨnap Esiya nɨb,
ogɨnap Piligiya nɨb, ogɨnap Pampiliya nɨb, ogɨnap Yijip nɨb, ogɨnap Libiya, Saylini gol okok nɨb, ogɨnap Lom nɨb,

ogɨnap Klit nɨb, ogɨnap Alebiya nɨb agɨlak. Chɨn ogɨnap Juda yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl, ogɨnap Juda mel man okok nɨb okok nɨb ownok ak pen Juda binɨb gɨpal tek ak gɨpun agɨlak. Pen takaw yɨbɨl chɨn keke mɨdeb tek ak agel chɨn mɨdupsek nɨgobun agɨlak. God kɨles tɨmel gɨl, tap teplep okok mɨdupsek gak ak agebal agɨlak.
Anɨb agɨl, gos kuŋay nɨgɨlɨg ju dɨl, pen agnɨgek pen agnɨgek gɨl agɨlak, Ke yɨbɨl geb anɨb ak tay gɨnɨg geb agɨlak.
Pen binɨb ogɨnap agjulɨg agɨlak, Ak ñɨg wayn kuŋay ñɨbɨl sawl gɨl agebal agɨlak.

Anɨb agelak, Pita ayɨp bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb wog jɨmñɨl gep okok ayɨp tɨkjakɨl, takaw awl agɨl agak, Nɨb Juda binɨb okok, binɨb mɨdupsek Jelusalem mɨdebɨm okok, takaw agebin ak nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak.
2.15 1 Te 5.7 Bɨ anɨb okok takaw yɨbɨl keke agebal ak, ñɨg wayn ñɨbɨl ma agebal agak. Binɨb kɨli ñɨg wayn ak sub kɨdek owup won ak ma ñɨbal, dugep won anep ñɨbal agak. Mɨñɨl mɨnek won ak agak.
Pen takaw yɨbɨl keke agebal nɨgebɨm anɨb awl, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb ak Jowel, bɨlel agɨl tɨkak tek nep gup agak. Ne takaw anɨb ak tɨkɨl agak,

God agup, Ñɨn kɨdek ak binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop Kawnan yad ak yokɨnɨgayn agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Ñɨpay nɨb okok kɨlop gos ñek agñɨnɨgabal agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Bɨ pɨlaj okok day nɨgɨnɨgabal agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Bɨawl okok wɨsɨn nɨgɨnɨgabal agup agɨl tɨkak agak.
Ñɨn anɨb ak, binbɨ yɨp wog gɨñɨbal okok kɨlop Kawnan yad ak yoken gos ñek, binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨnɨgabal agup agɨl tɨkak agak.
Pen adekab alaŋ tap ke yɨbɨl ogɨnap gɨl, lum awl ak tap mageptek ogɨnap gɨnɨgayn agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Pen nɨkɨm sek gɨl, mab yɨnɨl, sɨkom awl gɨl gɨnɨgab agup agɨl tɨkak agak.

Sub ak mɨlek ma gɨl, takan ak nɨkɨm sek lɨnɨgab agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Anɨgek, kɨdek nɨm Bɨawl ñɨn awl ne ak ownɨgab agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Ñɨn awl anɨb ak apek, Bɨawl kɨles ne ak sek mɨlek ne ak sek yomnɨgab agɨl tɨkak agak.
2.21 Lom 10.13 Pen binɨb bɨawl nop agnɨgɨnɨgabal okok, kɨlop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgab agup agɨl tɨkak agak.

Pita ne Jowel ñu kɨl tɨkak takaw anɨb ak agjuwɨl agak, Nɨbi Yislel binɨb. Takaw agɨnɨgebin awl nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Jisas bɨ Nasalet nɨb ak, bɨ yokɨp mel agak. God ne nokom nop aglɨl agyokek owak agak. Nop agyoken tap mageptek gek nɨŋɨd, God bɨne agɨnɨgabal agɨl agyokak agak. Agyokek apɨl, tap mageptek okok gek nepɨm agak.

2.23 Mat 27.35, Mak 15.24, Luk 23.33, Jon 19.18, Apo 4.28, 1 Pi 1.20 God ne nɨbi gɨnɨgabɨm tek nɨŋɨd, Jisas nop dɨ ñɨn adek nɨbop ak lek, dam binɨb God nop ma nepal okok kɨlop ñɨbek, mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak agak.
2.24 Mat 28.5-6, Mak 16.6, Luk 24.5, Apo 3.15, 4.10, 10.40, 13.30-31, 17.31, 1 Ko 15.15 Yul awl dɨl kumak ak pen, kumeb bad ak nop chɨchɨk dɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lak agak. God gek tepayaŋ tɨkjakak agak.
2.25-28 Sng 16.8-11 Pen Yislel bɨnonɨm Depid, ne bɨlel Jisas nop takaw ak ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agak,
Anɨgek yɨp tep gek, mɨñmɨñ yɨbɨl gɨpin agɨl tɨkak agak. Kumnɨg abe ma pɨlɨkɨpin agɨl tɨkak agak. Yad nop gos nɨŋɨd, tap teplep abe kod mɨdebin agɨl tɨkak agak.
2.27 Apo 13.35 Yɨp agup, Nad bɨ suŋtep yɨbɨl yad ak, binɨb kubal okok ayɨp mɨdɨl ma kuy gɨ yownɨgaban agup agɨl tɨkak agak.
Pel mɨdep kanɨb ak yɨp yomnak tek, nad ayɨp pelpel mɨdɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgayn agɨl tɨkak agak.
Pita ne Depid ñu kɨl tɨkak takaw anɨb ak agjuwɨl agak, Mam sɨkop. Depid takaw agak anɨb ak, ne ke dɨl ma agak. Based yes chɨn Depid ne kumek, kamɨlak kaw mɨgan ak mɨñɨl abe nopun agak.

2.30 2 Sml 7.12-13, Sng 89.3-4, 132.11 Pen ne bɨ God gos ñek agñeb ak nɨm, ne nɨgak, God nop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨl agak, Ñɨ nad tɨke, tɨkel amɨl apɨl gɨnɨgab okok, kɨdek ñɨ olap nad bɨnonɨm mɨdeban tek mɨdɨl, binɨb kɨlop kod yenɨgab agak.
2.31 Sng 16.10, Apo 13.35 God agak anɨb ak nɨm, Depid nɨgak, kɨdek Klays kumɨl pɨsnep kuy gɨ yownɨmuŋ tek ma lak agak. God gek tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab tek nɨŋɨd, takaw anɨb ak agak.
2.32 Apo 1.8, 2.24 God gek, Jisas tepayaŋ tɨkjakek, wɨdɨn chɨn ke nɨŋɨd agobun agak.

2.33 Jon 14.26, Apo 1.4, 5.31, 7.55-56, 10.45, Epe 4.8, Hib 10.12 God Jisas nop man ne alaŋ dad amɨl, ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd okok ken lek, ne ayɨp mɨdeb agak. Nap ned agak tek, Kawnan ne ak Jisas nop ñak agak. Ñek, chɨnop yokek nɨm, apek takaw keke apun awl nepɨm agak.
2.34-35 Sng 110.1 Depid ne Jisas amnak tek ma amnak, God man ne alaŋ agak. Pen ne takaw ogɨnap tɨkɨl agak,
Besɨg mɨdɨl, mɨd dad amɨl, binɨb nad ayɨp penpen gep okok kɨlop tob muk nak okok len, taw tɨbɨkɨnɨgaban agup agɨl tɨkak agak.
Anɨb ak Depid takaw agak anɨb ak, nɨbi Yislel binɨb nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Jisas bɨ mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak ak nop, God gek Bɨawl yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Ne nokom Bɨ God nop aglup ak agak.

Pita takaw anɨb ak agek, binɨb yelak okok nɨgel chɨbol gos kɨlop aj lakak. Aj lakek, kɨli Pita ayɨp bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb wog jɨmñɨl gep okok ayɨp kɨlop agɨlak, Mam sɨkop, chɨn mɨñɨl tay gɨnɨgun agɨlak?

2.38 Luk 24.47, Apo 3.19 Agelak Pita agak, Nɨbi nokom nokom tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨl, Jisas Klays nop gos nɨŋɨd ñɨg pakɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨgenɨgabɨm, God tap si tap tɨmel gɨpɨm ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨl, Kawnan ne ak nɨbop yokɨnɨgab agak.

2.39 Ais 57.19, Jol 2.28, Apo 10.45, 14.27, Epe 2.13, 2.17 God bɨlel aglɨl agak, Kawnan yad ak nɨbop yokɨl, ñapay nɨbi tɨkɨnɨgabɨm okok yokɨl, binɨb man pal okok kɨlop yokɨl gɨnɨgayn agak. God Bɨawl chɨn ak, binɨb ne dɨnɨg gup okok kɨlop mɨdupsek, Kawnan ne ak yokɨnɨgab agak.
Pita ne kɨles gɨl agɨl, takaw kuŋay agɨl kɨlop agak, Nɨbi nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨbi binɨb okok tɨtɨmel gɨpal tek kelɨgɨl, mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Mel ak, yul awl dɨnɨgabɨm agak.
2.41 Apo 2.47, 4.4, 5.14 Pita ñɨn anɨb ak anɨgɨl agek, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl, anep 3,000 tek, takaw nop dɨl ñɨg pakɨlak. Pakɨl, kɨli apɨl bɨawl binɨb ne ned nɨb okok ayɨp jɨmñɨl yelak.
Bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok takaw agñelɨgɨpal ak, binɨb okok kɨli nɨgtep gɨlɨg, nɨmam kɨlop gos nɨŋɨd gɨñɨlɨg, tap mɨdup tɨpag jɨmñɨl ñɨbɨlɨg, God nop agɨlɨg yelɨgɨpal.
2.43 Mak 16.17, Apo 4.33, 5.11-12 God bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok kɨlop kod mɨdaknɨŋ, tap mageptek kuŋay yɨbɨl gelak, binɨb mɨdupsek jel gek pɨlɨkɨlak.
2.44 Apo 4.32-35, 5.12, 6.8 Binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak okok jɨmñɨl yelak ak nɨm, binɨb an tap yek okok, binɨb tap ma yek okok kɨlop monmon ñɨlak.
Lum awl, tap okok abe bɨ ogɨnap tawelak mani dɨl, binɨb tap ma yek okok kɨlop bɨlok ñɨlak.
2.46 Luk 24.53, Apo 1.14, 20.7 Mɨnek mɨnek God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek ak mɨgan ayaŋ apnan gelɨgɨpal. Pen kal kɨli okok abe nan gɨl, bilet tɨpagɨl mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg tap jɨmñɨl ñɨbelɨgɨpal.

2.47 Apo 2.41, 4.33, 5.14, 6.7, 11.21, 11.24, Lom 14.18 Anɨgɨlɨg, God nop tep agelɨgɨpal nɨŋɨd, binɨb yokɨp okok kɨlop nɨgel tep gak. Bɨawl mɨnek mɨnek binɨb ogɨnap sek opal ak kɨlop dek, ap binɨb ne ned nɨb okok ayɨp jɨmñɨl yelɨgɨpal.
